song.title: Consuming Fire
song.lyrics:
[1] .Em7 D/F# G There must be more than this .C Em7 D/F# C O breath of God come breathe within|| .Em7 D/F# G There must be more than this .C Em7 D/F# C Spirit of God we wait for You|| .Am7 G/B D/F# Fill us anew we pray .Am7 G/B D/F# Fill us anew we pray
[C] . G D/F# Consuming fire fan into flame . Em7 C A passion for Your Name || . G D/F# Spirit of God fall in this place . Em7 Lord have Your way . D C Lord have Your way with us
[b] .C Stir it up in our hearts Lord .D Stir it up in our hearts .Em7 Stir it up in our hearts . D A passion for Your Name --- ; Order 1 c 2 c b(x4) c(x2) [2] .Em7 D/F# G Come like a rushing wind .C Em7 D/F# C Clothe us with power from on high|| .Em7 D/F# G Now set the captives free .C Em7 D/F# C Leave us abandoned to Your praise|| .Am7 G/B D/F# Lord let Your glory fall .Am7 G/B D/F# Lord let Your glory fall
song.author: Hillsong Chapel
